column5: (StepDescription: Add-Add 1/3 cup cheddar cheese to a microwave-safe cup)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Add-Add 1/3 cup cheddar cheese to a microwave-safe cup and spill some outside while adding)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Add-Add 1 tablespoons of water to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Chop-Chop 1/4 red bell pepper into tiny bits)']
[' (StepDescription: Melt-Melt the cheese by microwaving cup for 30 sec. (Check after 30 seconds and microwave for 10 seconds more if needed).)']

column5: (StepDescription: Place-Place the chopped pepper in the microwave-safe bowl)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Place-Place the chopped pepper in the microwave-safe bowl and spill some bellpepper while transferring to bowl)']

column3: [' (StepDescription: Mix-Mix the cheese and red bell pepper in the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: add-add 1/2 tbsp softened butter to the bowl)']
[' (StepDescription: Mix-Mix all the ingredients of the bowl well)']
